premise: A futuristic detective mystery in Neo-Angeles about Zantar, a junior detective

game_elements.name: Chief of Police
past: Zantar got the job in the first place because his uncle is on the force
present: Zantar's parter Jimbo told him he has some leads on making a little extra money
future: Through whatever means, Zantar climbs the corrupt ranks, becoming chief of police

game_elements.name: Oatmeal Killer
past: Strange killings have been occurring where residents of neo-angeles are found dead, watching oatmeal commercials on their AR glasses
present: The killings continue. The ad-networks have been notified to stop running the ad, but it continues to pop up without explanation

game_elements.name: AI Overlord
future: Zantar uncovers a massive AI conspiracy controlling Neo-Angeles

game_elements.name: Cybernetic Underworld
future: Zantar becomes entangled in an underground cybernetic enhancement ring

game_elements.name: Zantar
present: This is the player character. All player actions are performed as Zantar
